elements.text: You're preparing for a vacation abroad for the first time in many years. You feel anxious at the thought of dealing with an unfamiliar environment. You get some fresh air and remind yourself that this trip is an opportunity to create cherished memories, and you start feeling...

elements.name: Vacation Abroad_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
